comment.author: 56266749@N07
comment._content: Wow. Is it still there? We have very nice synagogue in Plzeň - Czech Republic, it is third biggest synagogue in the world:)) but this is Montreal look fantastic, u took the foto of this synagogue? Let me know please .. :)

comment.author: 38184353@N00
comment._content: mmyrjaa, je to 100 rokov stara fotka, cela galeria obsahuje vyber z archivu McCord Muzea v Montreale.

comment.author: 58866185@N08
comment._content: All those Eastern patterns curving through each other, decorating the front wall of the Synagogue!  The small details and designs have made the whole building even more attractive.

comment.author: 70717533@N07
comment._content: L fachada de esta sinagoga es bellísima.¡Lástima que ya no se construya de esta manera tan artística y adaptada al medio ambiente...ahora es todo cuadrado, sin vida y si alma.

comment.author: 58793889@N00
comment._content: mmyrjaa – no, this building and many other of the city's older synagogues were demolished long ago. Guillaume Saint-Jean shows what's there now.

comment.author: 62155395@N02
comment._content: Looks like there was an entrance / exit for women separate from the men.
